ygData.subject: Re: Alternative FD 'nerf' being discussed on www.eqnecro.com
ygData.msgSnippet: This would be perfect. I was in hate and died because of this nerf and had to get summon corpse because to get my corpse. Naeeldar ... From: Chris Ling
ygData.messageBody:
This would be perfect. I was in hate and died because of this nerf and had
to get summon corpse because to get my corpse.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Chris Ling <ling@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, February 21, 2000 10:51 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Alternative FD 'nerf' being discussed on
www.eqnecro.com


>From: "Chris Ling" <ling@...>
>
>An alternative idea to the current Feign Death 'nerf' is being discussed on
>the message board of http://www.eqnecro.com
>(http://www.eqnecro.com/noncgi/Forum1/HTML/001723.html).
>
>Simply put, the idea (as described by Chiggy), would be when the 15 minute
>time limit was hit, the pet (if present) would commit suicide.
>
>To me, this seems MUCH more reasonable then making us stand up, risking
death,
>especially if your group hasn't re-broken their way back in to where you
are
>feigning.
>
>Anyway, I'm sure the necro comunity at large would benefit from the input
of
>this list, with perhaps even better ideas, or support of this one.
>
>
>Drakkyl of Povar
>Necromancer of the 8th Circle
>
>PS. I am interested in buying Words of Dissemination, Parasitism,
> Incorporeal, or Purification. Or, Vampiric Curse and Renew Bones.
> I have (1) Intensify Death for any interested lvl 24ish necros as
well.
>
>
>
>
